title: Hextech Crafting just died on me
body:
I bought 11 chests, was happily opening them and my 7th chest after it opened, I got the sound then loading screen.
http://i.imgur.com/vrrK0tk.png

Relogged, same issue.

Logged on Alpha, and still same issue. 
http://i.imgur.com/KoUShTG.png

It's just dead. And no doubt I've lost a chest I paid for.

replies.body: There are some server issues being worked on right now, but in the meantime hextech has been disabled.  Updates will be provided through our service status page.  The animation may not work, but the transaction should still go through.  If you do find yourself missing something, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) once services have been restored.  We'd be happy to take a look!
